basic.Target Organism: Fungi:Alternaria brassicola (MIC=1.2 µg/ml), Botrytis cinerea (MIC=1.8 µg/ml), Fusarium culmorum (MIC=4 µg/ml), Fusarium oxysporum f.sp.lycopersici (MIC=6 µg/ml), Pyricularia oryzae (MIC=0.5 µg/ml), Verticillium dahliae (MIC=1.5 µg/ml).NOTE:In synthetic low ionic strength fungal growth medium.
